title: Best-Selling Album
description: His album Thriller (1982) is the best-selling music album in history.

title: Moonwalk
description: He popularized the 'Moonwalk' dance move, which became his signature move in pop culture.

title: Guinness Records
description: Michael holds over 20 Guinness World Records, including 'Most Successful Entertainer of All Time.'

title: Humanitarian Work
description: He supported more than 39 charitable foundations â€” the most among musicians.

title: Nose Surgeries
description: Jackson underwent several plastic surgeries, especially on his nose, which was often discussed in the media.
